Weapon (@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.gpZnusEdpaxAPesT]{Battleaxe}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.YVEcMNtAEQnGLv0S]{Greataxe}, or @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Qbm3eVE1Xg8Aq30C]{Halberd}) - Rare (Requires Attunement)

Blood-soaked runes on this weapon feed its wielder's rage.


Properties

  • You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with the weapon.

  • While attuned, your Hit Point maximum increases by 1 for each level you have attained.

Curse. Attuning to the axe curses you until targeted by Remove Curse or similar magic; removing the weapon does not end the curse. While cursed, you are unwilling to part with the weapon, you keep it within reach, and you have Disadvantage on attack rolls made with weapons other than this one.

Whenever a creature damages you while you possess the axe, you must succeed on a [[/save ability=wis dc=15 format=long]] or go berserk until you start your turn with no creatures within 60 feet that you can see or hear.

While berserk, you treat the nearest creature you can see or hear as an enemy, moving toward it and using the Attack action each turn. If it dies or leaves your senses, the next nearest creature becomes your target.
